article_title: Wheat in Whitehorse: how climate change helps feed Canada's remote regions
article_description: After failing to grow wheat in Canada s subarctic Yukon territory 15 years ago  farmer Steve Mackenzie Grieve gave it another shot in 2017
article_content: After failing to grow wheat in Canada s subarctic Yukon territory 15 years ago farmer Steve Mackenzie Grieve gave it another shot in 2017 Thanks to longer summers  he has reaped three straight harvests  This spring he plans to sow canola on his family s 45   4975 chars
